Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays near 54th/Cermak due to mechanical problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays near 54th/Cermak due to mechanical problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
